displayName.spanish: Lo que el viento se llevó
displayName.latam: Lo que el viento se llevó

description.french: Touchez 200 pissenlits
description.spanish: Toca 200 dientes de león
description.schinese: 触碰200次蒲公英
description.japanese: 200本のタンポポに触れる
description.brazilian: Toque em 200 dentes-de-leão
description.latam: Toca 200 dientes de león.
description.portuguese: Toca em 200 dentes-de-leão
description.italian: Tocca 200 denti di leone

description.french: Explosez 100 gouttes de rosée au niveau 2
description.spanish: Explota 100 burbujas de agua en el nivel 2
description.schinese: 在第2关撞破100滴露珠。
description.japanese: ステージ2の描かれた水滴を100個破裂させる
description.brazilian: Estoure 100 gotas de orvalho no nível 2.
description.latam: Has estallar 100 gotas de rocío en el nivel 2.
description.portuguese: Explode 100 gotas de orvalho no nível 2
description.italian: Fai esplodere 100 gocce di rugiada al livello 2

description.english: Step on 50 passable bushes on Level 3
description.german: Steige in Level 3 auf 50 passierbare Büsche
description.french: Marchez sur 50 arbustes franchissables au niveau 3
description.koreana: 난이도 3에서 걸을 수 있는 덤불을 50걸음 이상 걸으세요
description.spanish: Pasa por 50 arbustos del nivel 3
description.schinese: 在第3关踩上50处可通过的灌木丛
description.russian: Наступите на 50 проходимых кустов на уровне 3
description.japanese: ステージ3の通り抜け可能な茂みを50個踏みつける
description.turkish: 3. seviyede 50 tane içinden geçilebilir çalıya bas
description.brazilian: Pise em 50 arbustos no nível 3.
description.latam: Atraviesa 50 arbustos en el nivel 3.
description.portuguese: Pisa 50 arbustos transitáveis no nível 3
description.italian: Calpesta 50 cespugli attraversabili al livello 3

description.english: Finish level 4 without being touched by a single sorrow
description.german: Schließe Level 4 ab, ohne von einer Trauer berührt zu werden
description.french: Terminez le niveau 4 sans être touché par un seul chagrin
description.koreana: 단 한 번의 슬픔에도 닿지 말고 난이도 4를 완료하세요
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 4 sin tocar ningúna sombra
description.schinese: 在不触碰忧伤的情况下完成第4关
description.japanese: ステージ4を1度もソロウに触れられずにクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ 4. poziom, nie dając się dotknąć żadnemu smutkowi
description.turkish: 4. seviyeyi tek bir kedere bile değmeden tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 4 sem ser tocado por nenhuma tristeza.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 4 sin tocar ningún pesar.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 4 sem seres tocado por uma única mágoa
description.italian: Completa il livello 4 senza farti toccare da un solo dolore

description.english: Finish level 5 without stepping on a single purple flower
description.german: Schließe Level 5 ab, ohne auf eine violette Blume zu treten
description.french: Terminez le niveau 5 sans marcher sur une seule fleur violette
description.koreana: 단 한 송이의 보라색 꽃도 밟지 말고 난이도 5를 완료하세요
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 5 sin tocar una sola flor lila
description.schinese: 在不触碰紫色花朵的情况下完成第5关
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 5, не коснувшись ни одного фиолетового цветка
description.japanese: ステージ5を1度も紫色の花を踏まずにクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ 5. poziom, nie nadeptując na żaden fioletowy kwiat
description.turkish: 5. seviyeyi tek bir mor çiçeğe bile basmadan tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 5 sem pisar em nenhuma flor roxa.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 5 sin pisar flores púrpuras.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 5 sem seres tocado por uma única flor lilás
description.italian: Completa il livello 5 senza calpestare un solo fiore viola

description.english: Perform 100 jumps on jump pads on Level 6
description.german: Führe in Level 6 100 Sprünge auf Sprungfeldern aus
description.french: Faites 100 sauts sur les rebondisseurs du niveau 6
description.spanish: Ejecuta 100 saltos en los saltadores del nivel 6
description.schinese: 在第6关的弹性平台上跳跃100次。
description.russian: На уровне 6 прыгните на платформах 100 раз
description.japanese: ステージ6のジャンプパッドで100回ジャンプする
description.polish: 100 razy podskocz na wyskoczniach na poziomie 6.
description.brazilian: Execute 100 saltos nos trampolins do nível 6.
description.latam: Da 100 saltos con los paneles del nivel 6.
description.portuguese: Salta 100 vezes em trampolins no nível 6
description.italian: Esegui 100 salti sulle piattaforme del livello 6

description.english: Finish level 7 without touching fire once
description.german: Schließe Level 7 ab, ohne ein Feuer zu berühren
description.french: Terminez le niveau 7 sans toucher le feu une seule fois
description.koreana: 불에 한 번도 닿지 말고 난이도 7을 완료하세요
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 7 sin tocar un solo fuego
description.schinese: 在不触碰火焰的情况下完成第7关
description.japanese: ステージ7を1度も炎に触れることなくクリアする
description.turkish: 7. seviyeyi ateşe bir kere bile değmeden tamamla
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 7 sem tocar nenhuma vez no fogo.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 7 sin tocar el fuego.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 7 sem tocar no fogo
description.italian: Completa il livello 7 senza toccare mai il fuoco

description.german: Schließe Level 8 ab, ohne zu sterben
description.french: Terminez le niveau 8 sans mourir
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 8 sin morir
description.schinese: 在不死亡的情况下完成第8关
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 8, ни разу не умерев
description.japanese: ステージ8を死なずにクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 8 sem morrer.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 8 sin morir.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 8 sem morrer
description.italian: Completa il livello 8 senza morire

description.english: Finish level 9 without dying of cold
description.german: Schließe Level 9 ab, ohne vor Kälte zu sterben
description.french: Terminez le niveau 9 sans mourir de froid
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 9 sin morir
description.schinese: 在不冻死的情况下完成第9关
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 9, не умерев от холода
description.japanese: ステージ9を凍死することなくクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ 9. poziom, nie umierając z zimna
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 9 sem morrer de frio.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 9 sin morir de frío.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 9 sem morrer de frio
description.italian: Completa il livello 9 senza morire di freddo

description.german: Schließe Level 10 ab, ohne zu sterben
description.french: Terminez le niveau 10 sans mourir
description.spanish: Finaliza el nivel 10 sin morir
description.schinese: 在不死亡的情况下完成第10关
description.russian: Пройдите уровень 10, ни разу не умерев
description.japanese: ステージ10をクリアするを死なずにクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível 10 sem morrer.
description.latam: Completa el nivel 10 sin morir.
description.portuguese: Termina o nível 10 sem morrer
description.italian: Completa il livello 10 senza morire

description.french: Activez le coop en jeu
description.spanish: Activa el cooperativo
description.schinese: 启动合作游戏模式
description.japanese: 協力プレイを起動する
description.brazilian: Ative o modo cooperativo.
description.latam: Activa el modo cooperativo.
description.portuguese: Ativar jogo em cooperação
description.italian: Attiva il gioco co-op
